name: GetPlayerObjectRot
description: Use this function to get the object's current rotation. The rotation is saved by reference in three RotX/RotY/RotZ variables.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The player you associated this object to.

params_body.name: objectid
params_body.description: The objectid of the object you want to get the rotation from.

params_body.name: &Float:X
params_body.description: The variable to store the X rotation, passed by reference.

params_body.name: &Float:Y
params_body.description: The variable to store the Y rotation, passed by reference.

params_body.name: &Float:Z
params_body.description: The variable to store the Z rotation, passed by reference.

return_values: The object's rotation is stored in the specified variables.
